Genre: Reality

In a factual journey of discovery, Paddy and Sally venture across four countries to discover vastly diverse gypsy societies. In Spain, Hungary, Ireland and Borneo, they find an array of colourful cultures, lifestyles and beliefs â€“ from virginity tests at a Spanish gypsy wedding to snail-hunting, clamspearing and agony aunts on a traveller magazine.

why is the title 'Max and Sally" when it's Paddy and Sally????
